summary: Completed comprehensive testing of QIRLLO School Management Platform. All core functionalities working correctly including authentication, dashboards, CRUD operations, grade entry, and role-based navigation.
passed_tests: Admin dashboard displays correct stats (12 students, 3 teachers, 6 classes)
Students CRUD operations working (create, read, update, delete)
Classes CRUD operations working (create, read, update, delete)
Grade entry functionality working (CA + Exam scores, save draft, submit)
Parent can view children's academic results with proper formatting
Role-based navigation working (admin, teacher, parent dashboards)
Dashboard stats API returns correct data for all roles
Grade calculation (40% CA + 60% Exam) working correctly
Academic report card formatting with Nigerian school context
All API endpoints returning expected status codes
